transcripts.text: You take rioters, looters, protesters, and arsonists, BLM, Antifa, communists, and feminists, quarantines, masks, social distancing, and curbside delivery, and coronavirus, piggy bola, locusts, and now murder hornets, plus the fact there's nothing but fat chicks, and you might just have a bad day.  But who are we kidding?  You're miserable.  The U.S.  is dying, and this is just the accelerated throes of its death.  You were just unfortunate enough to be born when you were, forcing you to endure these dark Arkham Asylum insane times.  But you only get to live once, and no, there is no afterlife, so it's up to you to make it count, and that's why you should buy and read Enjoy the Decline.  Enjoy the Decline teaches you how to enjoy life, even with society collapsing around you.  By focusing solely on what you can and cannot enjoy, combined with Herculean levels of stoicism, while also forgiving yourself of the burden of worrying about the future of Western civilization, you can make your short, rapidly dwindling life on this planet an enjoyable one, instead of the one of fret, worry, anger, insanity.  it is now.  Are women fat misandrist?  Meh.  Are taxes 60%?  Who cares.  And will the private sector media effectively eliminate the freedom of speech forever?  Oh, well.  Your life is too important to be bothered by such matters.  Enjoy the decline instead.  So make sure your life counts to the person who matters most to you.  Buy and read.  Enjoy the decline in paperback, Kindle, and audio on Amazon.com.
